verses.verse: Brethren <S%G80><s%>, <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>'s <S%G2107>desire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> my <S%G1162>supplication<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2474>them<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> they may be <S%G4991>saved<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2205>zeal<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> being ignorant <S%G50>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%>, <S%G1343><s%> they <S%G5293>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> subject <S%G5293>themselves<s%> to the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G4100>believeth<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>writeth<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall live2198, 1722 <S%G846>thereby<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%>, <S%G2036>Say<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G305>ascend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>? <S%G5124>(that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, to <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%>:)

or <S%G2228><s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>abyss<s%>? <S%G5124>(That<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, to bring <S%G5547>Christ<s%> up321, 321 <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.)

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> saith <S%G3004>it<s%>? The <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>: <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2784>preach<s%>:

because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou shalt <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shalt <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, thou shalt be <S%G4982>saved<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> with the <S%G2588>heart<s%> man <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> with the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> confession is <S%G3670>made<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2617>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be put to <S%G2617>shame<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>distinction<s%> <S%G5037>between<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greek<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2962>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> Lord is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%>, and is <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that call <S%G1941>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:
for <S%G1063><s%>, <S%G302><s%> <S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> shall call <S%G1941>upon<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall they call on <S%G1941>him<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G4100>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>? <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G4100>believe<s%> in him <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G191>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>? <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G2784>preacher<s%>?

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G1437>preach<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> they be <S%G649>sent<s%>? even <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G5613>How<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> are the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of them that bring glad <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of good <S%G18>things<s%>!

But <S%G235><s%> they <S%G5219>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5219>hearken<s%> to the glad <S%G2098>tidings<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>report<s%>?
So <S%G686><s%> <S%G4102>belief<s%> cometh <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>Christ<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G3361>say<s%>, Did <S%G191>they<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%>? <S%G3304>Yea<s%>, verily, <S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G5353>sound<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G3361>say<s%>, <S%G1097>Did<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%>? <S%G4413>First<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G3863>provoke<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G3863>jealousy<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> that which is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%>, <S%G1909>With<s%> a <S%G1484>nation<s%> void of <S%G801>understanding<s%> will I <S%G3949>anger<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> is very <S%G662>bold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, I was <S%G2147>found<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>; I <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1717>manifest<s%> unto <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1905>of<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G3650>All<s%> the day <S%G2250>long<s%> did I spread <S%G1600>out<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> a <S%G544>disobedient<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G483>gainsaying<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>.
